name: Talk_Anna_Recruit
_source: speak;Anna;Welcome to the Community Recruit Hub!|I'm Anna, your friendly neighborhood merchant.|Here you can recruit special units created by the community to join your army!
speak;Anna;These fighters come from all walks of life and bring unique abilities to your forces.|Just speak with me whenever you want to add new allies to your ranks!
speak;Davius;I am Davius, mercenary of the eastern plains.|My blade seeks purpose, and I hear you lead a worthy cause.
speak;Eirika;We welcome your strength, Davius.|Our path is fraught with danger, but we fight for peace.
speak;Anna;Ooh, this one's got talent!|A skilled swordsman with impressive defense.|He'll be a valuable addition to your front lines, Eirika!
speak;Davius;I pledge my sword to your service.|My techniques may be unconventional, but they are effective.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Davius.|We'll be counting on you in the battles ahead.
speak;Moze;My name is Moze, I hail from a Magvel, a bit different from yours.
speak;Anna;Oh really, I've heard of such possibilities with the Dragon's Gate.
speak;Moze;Yes, I came through the gate in search gaining strength.|Seeing what it was like on the other side.
speak;Eirika;Well we can use all the help we can get, I see you wield a lance Moze.
speak;Moze;Yes, it was my mother's.|I plan on helping you win this war, I can sense the darkness approaching.|If you'll allow it, I'll even use my full power as a dragon to defeat our enemies.
speak;Anna;Having a powerful ally support you in battle will be very helpful.|From what we know, dragons have strong defenses and can deliver devastating damage to foes.
speak;Eirika;I see, well Moze, would you be willing to lend us a hand?
speak;Moze;Of course, my lance is yours to command.
speak;ProTagonist;Hey there!|I'm Pro!|Just your average guy with extraordinary fighting abilities!
speak;ProTagonist;Well, you know how it is!|Living with fantastic powers is never simple!
speak;Anna;Oh my!|This one's special!|He has that protagonist aura about him!|Unnaturally spiky hair and all!
speak;ProTagonist;I may not look like much, but when my friends are in danger...|That's when my true power awakens!
speak;ProTagonist;I'm not fighting for glory or anything.|I just want to protect everyone's smiles and become stronger along the way!
speak;Anna;Classic protagonist material right here!|He'll probably grow exponentially stronger through the power of friendship!
speak;ProTagonist;So what do you say?|Can I join your party and help you defeat the forces of evil?|I promise I'll never give up, no matter how tough the enemy is!
speak;Eirika;Your enthusiasm is...refreshing.|Welcome to our ranks, Pro.
speak;ProTagonist;ALRIGHT!|Just watch me become the strongest bender ever!|This is the beginning of an amazing adventure!|I can use all 4 elements of bending!
speak;Cucara;Greetings!|My name is Cucara.|I am Lumberjack in my hometown.
speak;Cucara;Aye.|Chopping trees or enemies.|Makes little difference to my axe!
speak;Anna;Strong as an oak, this one!|With axe skills that are nothing to joke about.
speak;Cucara;I'll fight to protect what is important to me.|Simple as that.
speak;Eirika;Your directness is appreciated.|Welcome to our forces.
speak;Scintilla;Greetings from the skies!|I am Scintilla, harpy warrior of the western mountains.
speak;Eirika;A harpy warrior? That's quite rare to see in these lands.
speak;Scintilla;The winds carry me where I'm needed.|And they've guided me to your cause.
speak;Anna;Oh my!|A harpy healer with amazing aerial combat skills!|She can both mend wounds and create them!|She also can steal as well!|She can do it all!
speak;Scintilla;I may not look it, but my talons are sharp and my magic sharper.|Not to mention my lockpicking skills!|No enemy in the skies can match my speed.
speak;Scintilla;It's not confidence, merely truth.|Though I can soar through the clouds, I never lose sight of my allies below.|My magic can heal those who fight alongside me.
speak;Anna;A flying healer is incredibly valuable on the battlefield!|She can reach injured allies no matter where they are!
speak;Scintilla;I seek to be the greatest sky warrior in all the realms.|Fighting with you will test my limits and sharpen my skills.
speak;Eirika;We would be honored to have your talents, both in battle and healing.
speak;Scintilla;Then it's settled.|The winds of fate have brought us together.|I shall not disappoint you.
speak;Bart;...I am Bart.|From the ssssecret village of Ophidia.
speak;Bart;Yessss...|Wordsss are precious.|I ssspeak only when necessssary.
speak;Anna;This mysterious mage has incredible arcane knowledge of serpents!|With magic is as dangerous as the deadliest viper!
speak;Bart;The sssnakes taught me their sssecretsss.|Their wisdom flowsss through my veinsss.
speak;Eirika;Snake magic?|I've heard legends of such power, but never met a practitioner.
speak;Bart;Few outsssidersss have.|Our village remainsss hidden for a reassson.
speak;Anna;Earth elemental spells and snake arts!|A tactical advantage in any battle!
speak;Bart;I will ssserve your caussse.|The sssnakes have foretold it.
speak;Eirika;We welcome your unique abilities, Bart.
speak;Bart;My powersss are yoursss to command.|Sssso it isss written.
speak;Eirika;Ah!|I've never seen someone quite like you...
speak;Anna;Hmm, this one's curious!|A beastfolk soldier from another world...|And one with her own special magical abilities!
speak;Arno;Magic? S-soldier?|I... I have magic, I know that, but...|I can't remember anything.
speak;Anna;And an amnesiac! What a mystery!|Surely there's hidden potential to be unlocked?|Perhaps by honing her lance skills...
speak;Arno;...Um...F-focusing on, uh, not her.|...You require soldiers, miss?...|Y-you seem kind! And righteous...
speak;Eirika;I suppose you could say that.|We fight to secure the peace of this land.|You seem rather gentle, so you don't need to fight...|But we'd appreciate your aid.
speak;Arno;I...Well...|Y-you seem honest! I trust you!|If you need a lance, then...|I-I'll do my best!
speak;Eirika;Thank you...|Actually, do remember your name?
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Arno!|We'll be counting on you in the battles ahead.
speak;Anna;<red>Let me tell you a special trait of this unit!|She can use her other arsenal weapons regardless of weapon access!|It depends all on her lance rank!</>
speak;Lindsey;Salutations milady!|I am Lindsey, a genius shaman over yonder.
speak;Eirika;A female shaman. That's quite a rare profession in these lands.|Speaking of a self proclaim genius, you reminded me of a certain mage.
speak;Lindsey;Did I hear that right?|Another mage claiming to be a genius?|Let me see her and I will prove to you that I am the better spellcaster of all of Magvel!
speak;Anna;Oh my!|A peculiar shaman that also heals!|She has great potential on whatever path you want her to take. |Be it as a human or a monster|She has high aptitude for both species!

speak;Lindsey;Haha! Not only am I adept with ancient arts and the staff, but I am studying ways to transcend the human body!|Not to mention I am highly adaptative when I reach my peak!|Who knows, I might be able to learn ways to summon a sizeable force of fiends to fight for us!
speak;Eirika;Your gusto sure is admirable, Lindsey.
speak;Lindsey;But of course!|I am a genius after all!|A genius that is destined to master the ancient arts ahahahaaha!
speak;Anna;A healer that uses the dark arts offers opportunites as you push forward on your travels|She can patch up injured allies if she is not busy fighting armored or anima wielding enemies.
speak;Eirika;We would be honored to have your talents, both in battle and healing.
speak;Lindsey;Then it's settled.|I will show you the fruits of my research on the fiends.|I shall not disappoint you.
speak;Azuth;I am Ainz Ooal...|No, in this realm, I am known as Azuth.|Supreme ruler of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, though it seems quite far from here.
speak;Eirika;A ruler?|You certainly have an imposing presence.
speak;Azuth;When one commands legions of the undead, a certain aura of authority becomes second nature.
speak;Anna;Oh my!|This one's truly exceptional!|A dark mage of unparalleled power!|His necromancy skills could turn the tide of any battle!
speak;Azuth;Death is merely a tool at my disposal.|My magic extends far beyond what mortals typically comprehend.|Perhaps this world holds new knowledge I can add to my collection.
speak;Eirika;Your abilities sound...formidable.|But may I ask why you would join our cause?
speak;Azuth;A wise ruler never stops seeking new experiences.|This seems an intriguing diversion, and your goals appear reasonable enough.|Consider my power at your service...for now.
speak;Anna;His tactical brilliance combined with overwhelming magical might!|He'll be devastating against enemy formations!
speak;Azuth;I shall demonstrate what it truly means to face a Supreme Being.|Those who stand against us shall know despair.
speak;Eirika;We...appreciate your confidence, Azuth.|Please try to keep the despair focused on our enemies.
speak;Azuth;As you wish.|For the glory of Nazarick...|And your cause, of course.

speak;Anna;This my friend is a slime.|Slimes are usually low level creatures.|However this little one is unique.|It has a high magical aptitude, but more importantly, it has the capacity to evolve into a stronger specie.|Who knows, she might become a mighty warrior, or ascend as a slime queen herself!
speak;Anna;She might not speak well at the moment, but in time she will develop a more solid personality.
speak;Eirika;I see...|Is it just me, or does she looks like you?
speak;Anna;Ahahaha...|Well she was with me for a long time so she modeled herself after me.|Nonetheless, I entrust this little one to you now.
speak;Alexander;Alexander, master bowyer and hunter, at your service.|These crossbows? Built them with my own hands.
speak;Eirika;A craftsman as well as a fighter?|That's an unusual combination.
speak;Alexander;The bow that fits your hand perfectly is the one that never misses.|Why trust another's craftsmanship when I can perfect my own?
speak;Anna;This one's quite the find!|A skilled hunter with custom-built weapons!|His crossbows have modifications you won't see anywhere else!

speak;Alexander;Standard issue just doesn't cut it in the wilds.|I've added my own improvements - better range, faster reload, fine-tuned bolts.|When your life depends on your weapon, every detail matters.
speak;Eirika;Your dedication to your craft is impressive.

speak;Alexander;Been tracking game through forests and mountains since I was a boy.|Learned to spot weaknesses, predict movements.|Those skills work just as well against men as they do against beasts.
speak;Anna;A hunter's eye and an engineer's mind!|He can spot enemy vulnerabilities from incredible distances!
speak;Alexander;I joined this fight because sometimes the most dangerous predators walk on two legs.|Point me at your target, and consider it done.
speak;Eirika;We welcome your expertise, Alexander.|Your skills will be invaluable on our journey.
speak;Alexander;My bolts fly true, and my aim is steady.|You won't regret bringing me along.
speak;Diana;The name's Diana.|If something shiny catches my eye, don't blame me if it ends up in my pocket!
speak;Eirika;A thief?|I'm not sure that's the kind of reputation we wish to cultivate...
speak;Diana;Hey now, I've got standards!|I only take from those who won't miss it.|Besides, every coin I earn goes to the kids back home.
speak;Anna;This one's quite special!|Lightning-fast fingers and a knack for finding hidden treasures!|She can slip past enemies unnoticed and unlock even the most complicated mechanisms!
speak;Diana;Grew up on the streets, trained by the Shadowhand Guild.|Learned everything from picking locks to disarming enemies.|But that life's behind me...mostly.
speak;Eirika;You mentioned children?|What did you mean by that?
speak;Diana;There's an orphanage in the slums of Roseport.|Kids like I once was, with nowhere to go.|Every job I take gets them closer to a better life than I had.
speak;Anna;A noble cause behind those nimble fingers!|And those skills will be invaluable for accessing locked chests and doors during your journey!
speak;Diana;So, what do you say?|You need someone who can open doors that weren't meant to be opened?|I promise I won't steal from your allies...too much.
speak;Eirika;Your skills could indeed prove useful.|And your cause is honorable, despite your methods.
speak;Diana;Great!|You won't regret it!|Just keep an eye on your valuables until I learn everyone's names!|Old habits, you know?
speak;Eirika;Is that your name? You seem troubled.
speak;Jaffar;...I am the Angel of Death.|Or I was...|I don't remember how I came to be here.
speak;Anna;This one's quite the enigma!|A master assassin with unparalleled skill!|Though he seems to be missing some of his memories...
speak;Eirika;Whatever happened in your past, perhaps you can find a new purpose here.
speak;Jaffar;Death is all I know.|Perhaps redemption lies in a worthy death.

speak;Anna;Now, now!|Death isn't the only path to redemption!|Sometimes living is the harder challenge!|And worth noting - his full potential seems dormant for now.|He may grow stronger as he finds his purpose again!
speak;Jaffar;...You would trust me?|After what I've done?
speak;Eirika;I sense honesty in your words, despite your past.|Sometimes the most damaged souls are the ones most deserving of a second chance.
speak;Jaffar;...Then my blades are yours.|Until death claims me...or until I remember.
speak;Anna;<red>This unit's weapon takes a while to evolve, but becomes strong when it does!|Keep him alive long enough to see his true potential unleashed!</>
speak;Lyn;I am Lyn of the Lorca tribe.|Though I suppose I should say Lyndis of Caelin now.
speak;Eirika;You carry yourself like nobility, yet there's something untamed about you.
speak;Lyn;I was raised on the plains of Sacae by my tribe.|The wind and grasslands taught me how to move, how to fight.|Even with a noble title, the plains will always be my true home.
speak;Anna;Oh my!|A swordswoman of exceptional grace and speed!|Her blade work is as swift as the prairie winds!|And that bow technique - simply magnificent!
speak;Lyn;My grandfather's blood flows through my veins, but it's the lessons of the plains that made me strong.|Every battle taught me that hesitation means death.
speak;Eirika;Your heritage sounds quite complex.|What brings you to seek us out?

speak;Lyn;I've learned that sometimes you have to fight for what's right, even when the odds seem impossible.|Your cause reminds me of my own struggles.|Besides, I can't stand by when innocent people need protection.
speak;Anna;A natural leader with the heart of a warrior!|Her tactical instincts and lightning-fast strikes make her formidable against any foe!
speak;Lyn;I won't promise you an easy path, but I will promise you this:|My blade will never waver in defense of justice.|The spirit of Sacae rides with me.
speak;Eirika;Your conviction is admirable, Lyn.|We would be honored to have a warrior of your caliber join our cause.
speak;Lyn;Then it's settled.|May the wind guide our blades to victory.
speak;Eirika;You have quite an intimidating presence about you, Sir Tareon.
speak;Tareon;...Many have said so.|Fear is...useful.|Enemies hesitate when they look upon me.
speak;Anna;Oh my!|This one sends chills down my spine just standing here!|An armored knight who wields fear as effectively as his axe!|His very presence can shake enemy morale!
speak;Tareon;I carry...burdens.|Things I have done...|Things I cannot undo.|Perhaps serving a just cause will...balance the scales.
speak;Eirika;We all have shadows in our past, Sir Tareon.|What matters is what we choose to do going forward.
speak;Tareon;...You are not afraid?|Most cannot bear to look at me for long.
speak;Anna;A warrior who can terrify foes before the battle even begins!|That intimidating aura of his can make enemies falter just when they need courage most!
speak;Tareon;My axe has tasted much blood.|But if it can now serve to protect the innocent...|Perhaps there is still honor to be found.
speak;Eirika;Your willingness to fight for others despite your troubled past speaks well of your character.
speak;Tareon;...Then I pledge my axe to your cause.|May it find redemption in righteous battle.
speak;Anna;Having someone so imposing on our side will certainly make enemies think twice before attacking!
speak;Genji;I am Genji, former retainer of the House of the Rising Sun.|My master has fallen, and with him, my purpose.
speak;Eirika;A samurai?|Your clothing and bearing are quite distinctive.
speak;Genji;The way of the sword is all I have known.|Honor, duty, loyalty.|These were my guiding principles.|Now I drift like a leaf on the wind, seeking meaning.
speak;Anna;This one carries himself with incredible discipline!|A master swordsman trained in the ancient arts of the samurai!|His blade technique is poetry in motion!
speak;Genji;My katana thirsts for righteous battle.|In my homeland, we believed that a warrior's soul is reflected in his sword.|Perhaps in serving your cause, both blade and spirit can find peace.
speak;Eirika;Your dedication to honor is admirable, Genji.|We would welcome a warrior of your caliber.
speak;Genji;Then allow me to pledge my sword to your service.|Though my former master is gone, perhaps I can find new purpose in protecting what you hold dear.
speak;Anna;A disciplined knight with the heart of a warrior-poet!|His techniques blend grace with deadly precision!
speak;Genji;The cherry blossoms fall, but their beauty remains eternal.|So too shall my loyalty to this cause endure.
speak;Eirika;Your words carry great wisdom, Genji.|We are honored by your service.
speak;Anna;Oh, also to note Genji is a <red>T2 unit!</>|So he is gonna be stronger than most units if you just started!|So be careful with you EXP management!
speak;Atlas;I am Atlas, sworn protector of the innocent.|My sword exists to shield those who cannot shield themselves.
speak;Eirika;A noble calling.|What drives such dedication to protection?
speak;Atlas;I have seen what happens when the strong prey upon the weak.|Too many times have I arrived too late to prevent tragedy.|Never again, if I can help it.
speak;Anna;This one has the heart of a true guardian!|A sword knight whose defensive prowess is matched only by his unwavering resolve!|He'll stand firm against any threat!
speak;Atlas;My armor may be scarred and my sword worn from use, but my determination has never wavered.|Every battle I fight is for someone who cannot fight for themselves.
speak;Eirika;Your selflessness is remarkable, Atlas.|What made you choose this path?
speak;Atlas;A knight's true strength isn't measured by enemies defeated, but by lives saved.|I would rather take a hundred wounds than let harm come to an innocent.
speak;Anna;A stalwart defender who puts others before himself!|With him on the front lines, your allies can fight with confidence!
speak;Atlas;If your cause is just and your people in need of protection, then my blade is yours.|I swear by my honor as a knight.
speak;Eirika;We are fortunate to have someone so dedicated to justice join our ranks.
speak;Atlas;As long as there are those in need, I will be their shield.|This I promise.
speak;Oliver;I am Oliver, nice to meet you.|I'm not sure how I got here, I am still learning to control my magic you see.
speak;Eirika;Your magic...|It feels quite powerful, yet somehow familiar.
speak;Oliver;The people of my tribe say my magic resembles the Fell Dragon.|Oh I forgot to mention, my tribe worships the Fell Dragon, but don't worry they are good people.
speak;Anna;Oh my!|This is quite unexpected!|A mage wielding power similar to the legendary Fell Dragon!|Though he seems quite inexperienced with controlling it!
speak;Oliver;They raised me and my brother after we became orphans after all.|I know it sounds strange, but they taught me that power itself isn't evil.|It's how you choose to use it.
speak;Eirika;The Fell Dragon's power...that's quite concerning.|But you seem sincere in your intentions.
speak;Oliver;I understand your worry!|That's exactly why I need to learn proper control.|Maybe by fighting alongside good people like you,|I can prove that this power can be used for justice.
speak;Anna;Untrained but incredibly potent magical abilities!|With proper guidance, he could become a formidable ally!|Though he'll need careful instruction!
speak;Oliver;I promise I won't let this power hurt anyone who doesn't deserve it.|My tribe taught me that strength should protect, not destroy.
speak;Eirika;Your heart seems to be in the right place, Oliver.|We'll help you learn to control your abilities.
speak;Oliver;Thank you so much!|I won't let you down!|Together we can show that even the darkest power can serve the light!

speak;Anna;I see you have met with my tree friend right here.|Dryads are stalwart forest guardians. |As priestesses of mother nature, they serve as great support for your army.|Aside from healing, they also serve as rejuvinating dancers once they hit a certain milestone.|Nurture them well and you have a great support in later adventures.
speak;Tyrande;Oh you flatter me benefactor.| I' am but a mere servant.
speak;Eirika;A humble one too.|I like your demeanor.| Alright welcome to the our rag tag group.
speak;Jack;I am Jack, nice to meet you.|I'm an aspiring knight and my dream is to wield the ultimate weapon someday.
speak;Jack;That's right! I have heard stories that only true masters of the weapon triangle can wield it.
speak;Anna;Oh my!|This is quite unexpected!|An ultimate weapon that only masters of the weapon triangle can wield?|But he only seems to carry a sword for now...
speak;Jack;What was that? Oh! You're right! I must have forgotten my axe and lance somewhere...
speak;Jack;Yup!|This happens to me a lot. But don't worry I'll still be useful to you. I promise!
speak;Anna;A chaotic personality that shows potential.|He may seem like a lost cause right now but with proper training he might become a powerful ally.|Though he'll need careful instruction!
speak;Eirika;Your dream is inspiring, Jack.|We'll be glad to have you on our side and watch you make that dream a reality.
speak;Jack;Thank you so much!|You can count on me!|Uhh by the way... has anyone seen my horse?
speak;Anna;Princess, this man has come running here searching for you!
speak;Eirika;Jonathan?|Is that you?|It has been such a long time.

speak;Jonathan;True, I have not gone to the castle since my retirement.|Was a little busy taking care of my family and...|NO, FORGET THAT!|I need to know, Eirika, where is your father?|I heard that Renais was attacked and came here as fast as I could.
speak;Jonathan;No, no, no...|I can't believe it...|In its most desperate hour, I left King Fado to die...|I'm a failure.
speak;Eirika;Don't say that!|Grado attacked without notice, you could not have known in time to save my father.
speak;Jonathan;No, Princess, I was the King's Hand.|I should have been always there, close to him, to protect him...
speak;Eirika;...Then how about this?|You cannot help my father anymore, but you can help me and my brother reclaim the throne.|Your help could be a turning point!

speak;Jonathan;...I can see how this would be a way to redeem myself.|Then it's settled, I will help you, Princess.|And I swear to you, even if I have to raise my axe against the devil himself, I swear I will stand by your side!

speak;Anna;<red>Fair warning to you, Princess!|This veteran warrior is incredibly powerful from years of experience!|His presence might make your early battles much easier than expected!|Use his strength wisely!</>
speak;Fajar;Greetings!|I am Fajar, daughter of the storm!|My blades sing with the voice of thunder itself!
speak;Eirika;Your energy is quite infectious, Fajar.|And those katanas...they seem to crackle with electricity.
speak;Fajar;Haha!|Sharp eyes!|These thunder katanas were forged in the sacred storms of Mount Raijin!|Each strike carries the fury of lightning!
speak;Anna;Oh my!|A spirited swordswoman who wields the power of storms!|Her blade work is as swift as lightning and twice as deadly!
speak;Fajar;My sensei always said that a warrior's spirit should burn as bright as their blade!|I live by those words every single day!
speak;Eirika;Your enthusiasm is admirable.|What brings you to seek us out?
speak;Fajar;Adventure calls to me like thunder calls to the mountains!|Besides, I can sense that you fight for something greater than yourself.|That's the kind of battle worth joining!
speak;Anna;With her electrifying techniques and boundless energy, she'll be a shocking addition to your forces!|Literally!
speak;Fajar;My blades have been blessed by the storm spirits themselves!|Together we'll cut through our enemies like lightning splits the sky!
speak;Eirika;We would be honored to have your strength and spirit with us, Fajar.
speak;Fajar;Excellent!|Let's make this journey one for the ages!|The storm rides with us!
speak;Vespera;I am Vespera, a warrior from another world.|I heard your summons and responded.
speak;Anna;She seems like a loyal knight from an old fairy tale!|There's something almost ethereal about her presence!
speak;Eirika;She looks like an angel from the books I read as a child.
speak;Vespera;You may put me on the frontline or have me support from the back line.|I will gladly do both.
speak;Anna;Such versatility!|A warrior who can adapt to any situation the battlefield demands!|Her skills seem to span multiple disciplines!
speak;Vespera;My purpose is to serve those who fight for justice.|Your cause resonates with the oath I swore long ago.
speak;Eirika;Your willingness to help is deeply appreciated.|We could certainly use someone with your experience.
speak;Vespera;I have seen many worlds, many battles.|Yet the fight between light and darkness remains constant.|Allow me to lend my strength to your light.
speak;Anna;With her mysterious past and adaptable combat style, she'll be invaluable no matter what challenges lie ahead!
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Vespera.|Your strength will be a great help for all of us.
speak;Vespera;Then let us move forward together.|The path may be treacherous, but we shall not falter.
speak;Eirika;I'm just confused as to how a snag is sentient.
speak;Anna;Oh my!|This is certainly a first!|A talking tree snag with dreams and aspirations!|I've seen many unusual warriors, but this is truly unique!
speak;Wally;W-Well my name is Wally and...I want to be a wall.
speak;Eirika;A snag...that wants to be a wall?|That's...I'm not sure how to react to that.
speak;Wally;Yeah!|I wanna be a wall, not just any wall, the BEST wall in all of Magvel.|Nay, the world!
speak;Anna;Well, Wally's defensive capabilities are certainly impressive!|Wally can block attacks and protect allies with remarkable effectiveness!|Though Wally's mobility is...limited.
speak;Wally;D-Do you not like my dream?
speak;Eirika;It's not that, it's just...never mind.|We need all the help we can get.
speak;Wally;Thank you.|I promise I'll be the best friend I can be.
speak;Anna;With proper positioning, Wally could serve as an excellent defensive anchor!|Just don't expect Wally to chase down fleeing enemies!
speak;Wally;Uh...can you help carry me?|I can't really move on my own...
speak;Anna;Well, that's certainly going to be an interesting logistical challenge!
speak;Anna;And here's one of our more durable recruits, the knight Eterna!
speak;Anna;And one of our more shy recruits as well!|A tough knight with impressive defense.|She'll be a worthy wall to protect your more vulnerable soldiers!
speak;Eterna;N-Nice to meet you too!|I'm guessing you're my commander?
speak;Eirika;Correct!|I promise to lead you to victory!
speak;Eirika;Your craftsmanship is incredible!|I've never seen weapons forged with such precision.
speak;Andre;Aye.|I've been smithing for longer than most can remember.|These hands have forged countless blades for warriors like yourself.
speak;Eirika;Like myself?|You mean you've armed other heroes before?
speak;Anna;Oh my!|A master blacksmith of legendary skill!|Such talent!|Look at the quality of that metalwork!
speak;Andre;Heroes, villains, undead, living.|All seek my forge eventually.|Steel cares not for the wielder's intentions.
speak;Andre;Reality is grim, lass.|But a well-forged blade can cut through any darkness.
speak;Eirika;Would you...consider joining our cause?|Your skills would be invaluable.
speak;Anna;His combat prowess matches his smithing abilities!|He can crush enemies with his fists and support his allies!|A true warrior-craftsman!
speak;Andre;Your cause...it has merit.|The flames of your resolve burn bright.
speak;Andre;Aye.|My hands serves justice as well as it serves the forge.|Let us see what manner of legend we can forge together.
speak;Anna;Wonderful!|With Andre's expertise, our army will be stronger!|<red>He starts as a T2 class so he will be very strong!</>
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Andre.|Your strength will make all the difference.
speak;Vector;By the Emperor's will, I stand ready for duty.
speak;Eirika;Your armor...it's unlike anything I've ever seen.|Is that some kind of magical enhancement?
speak;Vector;Not magic, Princess.|Advanced technology from the far future.|Power armor, enhanced weapons, tactical systems.
speak;Eirika;The far future?|How is that possible?
speak;Anna;Incredible!|A warrior from tomorrow with weapons beyond our comprehension!|His equipment must be worth a fortune!|Though I have no idea how to appraise future technology!
speak;Vector;I serve the Imperium of Man.|My duty is to purge heretics and defend humanity from the darkness.
speak;Eirika;Humanity?|Then we share a common goal.
speak;Vector;Affirmative.|Your cause aligns with Imperial doctrine.|The protection of innocent lives is paramount.
speak;Eirika;I'm not sure I understand all these terms, but your dedication is clear.

speak;Anna;His tactical knowledge is extraordinary!|Plus those weapons could devastate entire enemy formations!|I've never seen such advanced military equipment!|<red>He starts as a T2 class so he will be very strong!</>
speak;Vector;Princess Eirika.|Your leadership shows promise.|I request permission to join your campaign.
speak;Eirika;Of course!|We'd be honored to have a warrior of your caliber.
speak;Vector;For the Emperor and for Renais.|My bolter and blade are yours to command.
speak;Anna;With Vector's future technology, we'll have firepower unlike anything our enemies have faced!
speak;Eirika;Welcome to our cause, Vector.|May your advanced knowledge help us protect our people.
speak;Eirika;Sorry, am I interrupting something?|Why are you upside down?
speak;ClaudeFlip;Oh I am just practicing my archery.
speak;Eirika;Oh so you are an archer?|Why do you need to be upside down to practice your archery?
speak;ClaudeFlip;In my homeland Almyra our archers fly in the sky on wyverns.|It's not unusual to be upside down during a battle in the sky.|You gotta be prepared for anything.
speak;Anna;Oh my, what an intersting young man.|I have never heard of a land where achers ride on wyverns.
speak;Eirika;Amyra?|I've never heard of it either.|Aren't you getting dizzy?|You should come down from that tree already.
speak;Claude;There we go.|Let me properly introduce myself.|I am Claude von Riegan.|I am the grandson of the leader of the Leicester Alliance.
speak;Eirika;I am princess Eirika. So you are from the Leicester Alliance?|I thought you said your homeland was called Almyra.

speak;Claude;I was born and raised in Almyra.|Actually I'm an Almyran prince.|But my mother is from the Alliance|so I decided to get to know her homeland too.|Let's keep this between as though.|What do you say your highness?
speak;Anna;A prince from an unkown land that is skilled in archery.|He also has a certain charm to him|I am sure he'll be a great addition to your team!
speak;Eirika;Oh that's right!|Claude, would you join me and fight on my side?
speak;Claude;Sure thing.|You can count on me.
speak;Eirika;Thank you Claude.|We're lucky to have you on our side.
speak;Esperanza;Hello there!|Names Esperanza!|I aim to be a master swordswoman!
speak;Eirika;Hello there Esperanza!|We would appreciate your strength in our conflict!

speak;Anna;This one is a literally sharp cookie!|She's skilled and speedy, perfect for going against slow axe wielders.|She even has two personal swords for use, one that can send flames and another that can do effective damage like a rapier!
speak;Esperanza;Thanks for the compliments, Anna!|Shall we begin our journey together, lady Eirika?
speak;Eirika;So polite!|Let us be off then!

speak;Ann;This is a note written to me by a certain person from on high.|"This unit is named Tanaka."|"Please disregard if you remember him being named Tanaka."|"I had to rewrite this entire dialogue."|"I worked hard to make the old dialogue fun."|"Just take him."
speak;Garmr;Who dares approach me?|The Guadian of Hell himself, Garmr.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Oh!|What is this?|Is that a dog?
speak;Garmr;Dog?!|How dare you compare me to such a lesser being!;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;It sure seems to be barking a lot.
speak;Anna;Oh my!|Looks like you found a Hellhound!|It's rare for them to not attack.
speak;Garmr;Foolish mortals!|Do you not understand my words?;;;noir;;white
speak;Anna;Maybe you can convince this Hellhound to join you.| It would be a strong ally for sure.
speak;Eirika;Of course!|If it's a Hellhound it might join me if I give it something.
speak;Garmr;Foolish girl!|A mere mortal wishes to recruit me to for their cause?|What could you possibly offer me.|The great Guardian of Hell!;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Here you go|I got something for you.

speak;Garmr;Is that... a treat?|.....|I am starving...|And I lost most of my power when I got stranded in this realm...|Very well mortal.|I shall join you for now.|I will feast on the souls of your enemies...|And this treat.;;;noir;;white
speak;Anna;It seems like the Hellhound has acepted the treat.|It should now fight on your side.
speak;Eirika;Great!|Looks like I found myself quite the curious ally.
speak;Anna;Oh my, another visitor from the Dragon's Gate!|Welcome! My name is Anna, and-
speak;Miria;I need information.|Where am I, and who brought me here?
speak;Anna;Well, you've been transported through the Dragon's Gate.|This is a place where-
speak;Miria;I didn't ask for transportation.|Someone made this decision without my consent.|That's already one mark against whoever runs this operation.
speak;Anna;I assure you, it's not quite like that.|The Dragon's Gate operates on its own-
speak;Miria;Everything operates by someone's design.|There's always a hand behind the curtain.|I've seen enough corruption to know that much.
speak;Miria;You're nobility.|I can tell by your bearing.
speak;Eirika;I'm Eirika, Princess of Renais.|May I ask your name?
speak;Miria;Miria.|I'm a mercenary.|I eliminate corruption wherever I find it.
speak;Miria;It's the only mission that matters.|Corruptions brings about beasts that I must slaughter.
speak;Anna;My, that's quite a heavy burden to carry alone.
speak;Miria;I don't carry it because I want to.|I carry it because no one else will.
speak;Eirika;I understand that feeling more than you might think.|My kingdom was invaded, my father killed.|Who know what else might come our way?...
speak;Miria;Then you know why I do what I do.
speak;Eirika;Miria, would you consider joining us?|We're fighting to restore peace and justice to these lands.|If you truly seek to eliminate corruption,|our cause might align with yours.
speak;Miria;I work alone.|It's simpler that way.
speak;Eirika;I respect that.|But even the strongest warrior can accomplish more with allies.|And from what you've said, your mission is too important to limit yourself.
speak;Miria;...You make a fair point.|Very well. I'll join you, Princess.|But know this-if I see corruption within your ranks,|I won't hesitate to act.
speak;Eirika;I wouldn't expect anything less.|Thank you, Miria.|Your conviction is admirable.
speak;Anna;Such a serious young woman.|I'm sure she'll be a valuable addition!
speak;Miria;I'll do what needs to be done.|Nothing more, nothing less.
speak;Anna;Oh! Hello there!|Welcome to the Dragon's Gate!|My name is-
speak;Anna;Um...can you hear me?|I'm Anna, and I'd like to-
speak;Anna;Oh good!|Then let me explain.|You've been brought here through-
speak;Anna;Well...yes, but don't you want to know-
speak;Anna;This is...quite difficult.|You're not very talkative, are you?
speak;Anna;Princess Eirika!|Thank goodness.|This young woman is... well... she's not very responsive.
speak;Eirika;Hello.|I'm Eirika, Princess of Renais.|May I ask your name?
speak;Eirika;It's nice to meet you, Nyx.|You seem...troubled.|Is something wrong?
speak;Nyx;Nothing is wrong.|Nothing is right.|It simply is.
speak;Eirika;Nyx, where are you from?|Do you have somewhere you need to return to?
speak;Nyx;Nowhere.|I go where the wind takes me.|I stay nowhere long.
speak;Nyx;Loneliness requires the capacity to miss something.|I do not miss anything.
speak;Anna;Oh dear...this poor girl...|She seems so detached from everything.
speak;Eirika;Nyx, I don't know what you've been through,|but you don't have to wander alone anymore.|Would you join us? Travel with our army?
speak;Eirika;Because everyone deserves companionship.|And because we could use someone with your skills.
speak;Nyx;My skills...|You've heard of me, then.|The Silent Death.
speak;Eirika;I...no, I haven't.|But I can see you're a warrior.|That's enough for me.
speak;Nyx;...You don't fear the title.|Most do.
speak;Nyx;...No.|I kill only those who need killing.|Nothing more.
speak;Eirika;Then you and I have the same goal.|We're fighting against those who threaten the innocent.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Nyx.|I hope in time, you'll find what you're looking for.
speak;Nyx;I am not looking for anything.|But...I will follow.
speak;Anna;Well...that was certainly unique.|I hope she opens up eventually.
speak;Shiro;Fascinating.|The spatial displacement was instantaneous.|Yet I felt no disorientation whatsoever.
speak;Anna;Oh! You're taking this quite well!|Most people are rather shocked when they arrive.

speak;Shiro;Shock is a natural response to the unknown.|However, I prefer observation and analysis.|This appears to be some form of teleportation magic.|The residual energy signature is unlike anything|I've encountered in my studies.
speak;Anna;My, you certainly know your magic!|I'm Anna. Welcome to the Dragon's Gate!
speak;Shiro;Anna. A pleasure.|I am Shiro. I study the magical arts.|Might I inquire about the mechanism behind this transportation?
speak;Anna;Well, the Dragon's Gate operates through-|actually, I'm not entirely sure of the specifics myself.
speak;Shiro;I see. A phenomenon beyond current understanding.|How intriguing. I shall have to document this.
speak;Eirika;Hello. I'm sorry to interrupt.|I'm Eirika, Princess of Renais.
speak;Shiro;Princess Eirika. An honor.|Forgive me, I was absorbed in my observations.|This is a rare opportunity to study unknown magical phenomena.
speak;Shiro;Indeed. My goal is to master all domains of magic-|anima, light, dark, and any other forms I may encounter.|Knowledge of magic is vast, and I have much yet to learn.
speak;Anna;All domains? That's quite an ambitious undertaking!
speak;Shiro;Ambition tempered by realism.|I do not expect to achieve this in a single lifetime.|But each day spent studying brings me closer to understanding.
speak;Eirika;That's an admirable dedication.|Shiro, would you consider joining our cause?|We're fighting to restore peace to these lands.
speak;Shiro;An interesting proposition.|Might I ask what this would entail?
speak;Eirika;We're gathering allies to fight against those|who threaten the innocent.|Your magical knowledge would be invaluable.

speak;Shiro;I see. Combat application of magical theory.|While my primary focus is scholarly research,|I understand that practical experience deepens understanding.|Battlefield conditions provide unique opportunities|to observe magic under duress.
speak;Shiro;Furthermore, traveling with your army|would expose me to different magical traditions|and potentially unknown forms of magic.|From an academic perspective, this is beneficial.
speak;Shiro;Yes. I accept your offer, Princess.|I shall contribute my magical abilities to your cause.|In return, I hope to expand my knowledge.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Shiro.|I'm certain your wisdom will be a great asset.
speak;Shiro;I shall endeavor to be useful.|Though I must warn you-I tend to become absorbed|in my studies. Please forgive any absent-mindedness.
speak;Anna;A brilliant mage with a scholarly mind!|This should be quite interesting indeed.
speak;Camilla;Anna, darling!|It's been far too long!
speak;Anna;Oh my!|Camilla!|What a surprise!|But... what are you wearing?|That's quite a different look for you.
speak;Camilla;Do you like it?|I'm trying something new.|Let's just say I'm going incognito for this little adventure.|A pirate's life seemed...exciting.
speak;Camilla;Shh, shh, shh. Not so loud, dear.|This stays between you and me, understood?|No one needs to know about my usual...circumstances.
speak;Anna;Oh! Of course!|My lips are sealed!|But why the disguise?
speak;Camilla;Sometimes a woman needs a break from expectations.|I want to experience something different.|No titles, no formalities, just pure adventure.|Can you help me with that?
speak;Anna;Well, if anyone can help with discretion, it's me!|What do you need?
speak;Camilla;I'll need some equipment.|Something appropriate for my new persona.|You wouldn't happen to have anything suitable, would you?
speak;Anna;Hmm, let me see...|Oh! I have just the thing!|This thunder axe-it should be a perfect replica of what you use!
speak;Camilla;Perfect replica?|I shouldn't be suprised you have something so similar of mine.|I love it.|This will do nicely.
speak;Anna;Wonderful! Just remember, if anyone asks-
speak;Camilla;You never saw me.|I know the routine, darling.
speak;Eirika;Anna?|I heard voices. Is everything alright?
speak;Camilla;Oh my!|And who is this lovely young lady?
speak;Eirika;I'm Eirika, Princess of Renais.|And you are?
speak;Camilla;Just call me Camilla, dear.|I'm a wandering pirate, seeking adventure on the high seas!|Well...and on land, apparently.
speak;Eirika;A pirate? You seem quite...refined for a pirate.
speak;Camilla;Oh, you're observant!|I like that.|Let's just say I have a colorful background.|But that's all in the past now.|I'm looking for a new crew to join.
speak;Anna;Princess Eirika leads a fine group!|I'm sure Camilla would be a valuable addition!
speak;Eirika;We could certainly use more skilled fighters.|Camilla, would you be interested in joining our cause?|We're fighting to bring peace to these lands.
speak;Camilla;Fighting for peace?|How noble.|And you seem like such a sweet girl too.|How could I possibly refuse?
speak;Camilla;Absolutely, darling.|I'll fight by your side.|Just promise me you'll take care of yourself.|I'd hate to see such a precious person get hurt.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Camilla.|I appreciate your concern.|I'm glad to have you with us.
speak;Anna;Wonderful!|Just remember our little agreement, Camilla!
speak;Camilla;Don't worry, Anna.|Your secret keeping is impeccable.|This will be our little secret.
